---
title: "Screencast"
output: html_document
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE,
	fig.width = 12, 
  fig.height = 8,
	fig.path ='Figs_Valid_date/',
  out.width = "90%"
)
```


```{r}
library(vembedr)

embed_url("https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D2URKCZepF4") %>%
 use_align("center")

```
